s0302: Confucius said: 'Alas, have you not heard?
s0303: The people are the foundation of the state, foundation solid the state is peaceful.
s0304: Now if we stop, how can I conduct myself?
s0305: Your fate is fate, my fate is fate.'
s0306: Gong Liang Ru said: 'Master cannot, I will go with master.'
s0307: Confucius said: 'You still consider me worthy, I am not worthy.
s0308: I do not try, thus am skilled.'
s0309: Confucius traveled, Gong Liang Ru was surrounded by Pu people, Confucius sent Zi Gong to persuade them.
s0310: Zi Gong went, said: 'Master being here is Pu's calamity.
s0311: If you can release his disciples, then it is master's calamity.
s0312: Master fortunately escapes, it is Pu's calamity.
s0313: Now where master is, the Wei lord contends with Pu people for him.
s0314: If you release him, then Wei lord contends with Pu people for him.
s0315: Master not wishing to see, then also useless.
s0316: If he sees, then it is master's calamity.'
s0317: Pu people released Gong Liang Ru and stopped Confucius.
s0318: Confucius heard of it, angry, said: 'Lu and Wei's governance are like brothers.
s0319: Now Lu and Wei are hostile, is it brothers' resentment?
s0320: Master's service cannot have two minds.
s0321: Therefore Lu people stop master, Wei people also stop master.
s0322: Master not going to Jin and Wei is not fearing the feudal lords.
s0324: Now cutting off Lu and Wei, then bad for those wishing to see.
s0325: If wishing to see, then first release oneself.
s0326: Thus Confucius from Wei went to Jin, passing through Kuang, Kuang people heard of it, thought he was Lu Yang Hu.
s0327: Therefore surrounded Confucius, disciples all had hungry appearance.
s0328: Confucius said: 'Since King Wen has passed, is culture not here?
s0329: If Heaven will lose this culture, later deaths cannot participate in this culture.
s0330: If Heaven has not lost this culture, what can Kuang people do to me!'
s0331: Confucius knew disciples had worried appearance, told Zi Gong: 'Have you heard?'
s0333: If there is calamity here, then it is master's calamity.
s0334: If there is no calamity here, then it is Kuang people's calamity.
s0335: If stop, then it is master's calamity.
s0336: If travel, then it is Kuang people's calamity.
s0338: Confucius said: 'Ci, you only know one, not two.
s0339: Since King Wen has passed, is culture not here?
s0340: If Heaven will lose this culture, later deaths cannot participate in this culture.
s0341: If Heaven has not lost this culture, what can Kuang people do to me!'
s0342: Confucius having explained, Kuang people welcomed Confucius.
s0343: Confucius arrived at Wei, Wei Hou welcomed him at the suburbs.
s0344: Confucius returned and stayed in Zou village, composing the Zou song to mourn.
s0345: Then returned to Wei, staying at the home of Qu Bo Yu.
s0346: Another day, Ling Gong asked about military formations.
s0347: Confucius said: 'Ritual matters I have heard of, military matters I have not studied.'
s0348: The next day, spoke with Confucius, saw flying geese, looked up at them, his attention not on Confucius.
s0349: Confucius thus left, returning to Chen.
s0350: Summer, Wei Ling Gong died, established grandson Jie, who became Wei Chu Gong.
s0351: Sixth month, Zhao Yang brought crown prince Kuai Kui inside Qi.
s0352: Yang Hu made the crown prince wear mourning clothes, eight people in mourning attire, falsely as those welcoming from Wei, crying as they entered, thus resided there.
s0353: Winter, Cai moved to Zhou Lai.
s0354: This year was Lu Ai Gong's third year, Confucius was sixty years old.
s0355: Qi helped Wei besiege Qi because crown prince Kuai Kui was there.
s0356: Summer, Lu Huan Xi temple burned, Nan Gong Jing Shu saved the fire.
s0357: Confucius in Chen heard of it, said: 'The disaster must be at Huan Xi temple?'
s0359: Autumn, Ji Huan Zi ill, carried to see Lu's city walls, sighed deeply saying: 'In the past this state almost prospered, but because I offended Confucius, it did not prosper.'
s0360: Looking back at his heir Kang Zi said: 'I will die soon, you must govern Lu;
s0361: governing Lu, must summon Zhong Ni.'
s0362: After several days, Huan Zi died, Kang Zi succeeded.
s0363: After burial, wished to summon Zhong Ni.
s0364: Gong Yu Yu said: 'In the past our former lord employed him but not to the end, finally became the laughingstock of the feudal lords.
s0365: Now employing him again, if cannot finish, this is again becoming the laughingstock of the feudal lords.'
s0366: Kang Zi said: 'Then who can be summoned?'
s0368: Thus sent envoys to summon Ran Qiu.
s0369: Ran Qiu about to go, Confucius said: 'Lu people summon Qiu, not for small use, will greatly use him.'
s0370: That day, Confucius said: 'Return home! Return home!
s0371: My party's youths are ardent and simple, their patterns are brilliant, I do not know how to cut them.'
s0372: Zi Gong knew Confucius wished to return, sent Ran Qiu, admonishing to 'if employed, use Confucius as the banner.'
s0373: Ran Qiu having left, next year, Confucius from Chen moved to Cai.
s0374: Cai Zhao Gong about to go to Wu, Wu summoned him.
s0375: Previously Zhao Gong deceived his ministers to move Zhou Lai, now about to go, ministers feared he would move again, Gong Sun Pian shot and killed Zhao Gong.
s0378: Next year, Confucius from Cai went to Ye.
s0379: Ye Gong asked about governance, Confucius said: 'Governance lies in attracting the distant and attaching the near.'
s0380: Another day, Ye Gong asked Confucius to Zi Lu, Zi Lu did not answer.
s0381: Confucius heard of it, said: 'You, why not answer saying "His character is: studies the Way without tiring, teaches others without wearying, becomes indignant and forgets food, joyful and forgets worry, does not know old age is approaching" thus.'
s0383: Chang Ju and Jie Nie were plowing together, Confucius considered them recluses, sent Zi Lu to ask for directions.
s0384: Chang Ju said: 'That one holding the reins, who is he?'
s0389: Jie Nie told Zi Lu: 'Who are you?'
s0391: Said: 'Are you Lu Kong Qiu's disciple?'
s0393: Said: 'The whole world is flooded, who can change it? Rather than follow a scholar who avoids this person and that person, better follow those who avoid the world.'
s0394: Planted his hoe and would not speak.
s0395: Zi Lu returned and told Confucius, Confucius sadly said: 'One cannot herd with birds and beasts. If the world is not the Way, with whom shall I go?
s0396: If the world has the Way, what need have I to change?'
s0397: 子路從而後，遇丈人，以杖荷蓧。
s0399: 丈人曰：「四體不勤，五穀不分，孰為夫子？」
s0400: 植其杖而芸，子路拱而立。
s0401: 止子路宿，殺雞為黍而食之，見其二子焉。
s0404: 使子路反見之，至則行矣。
s0407: 君臣之義，如之何其廢之？
s0411: 孔子謂子路曰：「吾聞之，君子遵道則譽，遁跡則无咎。
s0414: 自曹適宋，與弟子習禮大樹下。
s0415: 宋司馬桓魋欲殺孔子，拔其樹。
s0418: 孔子曰：「天生德於予，桓魋其如予何！」
s0419: 孔子適鄭，與弟子相失，孔子獨立郭東門。
s0420: 鄭人或謂子貢曰：「東門有人，其顙似堯，其項類皋陶，其肩類子產，然自要以下不及禹三寸。
s0423: 孔子欣然笑曰：「形狀，末也。
s0426: 孔子遂至陳，主於司城貞子家。
s0427: 歲餘，吳王夫差伐陳，取三邑而去。
s0431: 有隼集于陳廷而死，楛矢貫之，石砮，矢長尺有咫。
s0433: 仲尼曰：「隼來遠矣，此肅慎之矢也。
s0434: 昔武王克商，通道九夷百蠻，使各以其方賄來貢，使無忘職業。
s0435: 於是肅慎貢楛矢石砮，長尺有咫。
s0436: 先王欲昭其令德，以肅慎矢分大姬，配虞胡公而封諸陳。
s0438: 分異姓以遠職，使無忘服。
s0441: 孔子居陳三歲，會晉楚爭彊，更伐陳，及吳侵陳，陳常被寇。
s0444: 吾黨之小子狂簡，進取不忘其初。」
s0446: 過蒲，會公叔氏以蒲畔，蒲人止孔子。
s0447: 弟子有公良孺者，以私車五乘從孔子。
s0448: 其為人長賢，有勇力，謂曰：「吾昔從夫子遇難於匡，今又遇難於此，命也已。
s0449: 吾與夫子再罹難，寧鬬而死。」
